text: Læa (cng raluk thung) xi brxhim meux khea klaw kæ hmu chn khxng khea wa cng khearph phakdi tx xallxh læa cng yakerng tx phraxngkh nanhæla penkar di wa sahrab phwk than hak phwk tha nruxallxh nan man mimi xanac thi ca hı kheruxng yangchiph kæ phwk than dangnan cng khx kheruxng yangchiph ca kxallxh theid
